website_summaries.verdict: The Gigabyte Aero 15 OLED is an all-around winner for prosumer creatives who don't need pen or touch support.
pros: An OLED display combined with multiple profiles gives the Gigabyte Aero 15 OLED bonus points for people doing color work, and its performance is up to the needs of people doing photo and video editing on the go
cons: Bad webcam placement and subpar battery life for a work laptop

customer_reviews.title: Screen or graphics card not working
customer_reviews.text: This laptop arrived defective. Bought it exclusively for its OLED screen and how ironic that’s what doesn’t work. Had to return it. The bigger problem is I bought it for work, had to travel to South America with it and now I’m in need of a laptop ASAP and replacement won’t get back to me on time for my flight. Very bad first impressions with this company.
customer_reviews.author: nohan meza

customer_reviews.title: Bad unit
customer_reviews.text: Excited to get this notebook but was disappointed with what I received. This was supposed to be new but shipping box had previous shipping label showing it was originally shipped to else. The info included the S/N which matched my notebook. System started up fine but later discovered the GTX 1660 TI video card was not working and did device manager did not recognize it. Various other sporadic issues including WiFi, Sound and NVMe SSD card showing errors with chkdsk. Very disappointed with this transaction.
customer_reviews.author: JDH

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat this one!
customer_reviews.text: I could not have asked for more in a productivity and gaming laptop. Ahead of all competitors in all aspects , design , quality and features.
customer_reviews.author: Kazem Mirza

customer_reviews.title: The best for 3d modeling
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner 3d modeler, I’ve been looking for a powerful laptop I can carry around and get my work done in no time, I looked many reviews about this one and it’s one of the best laptops for a 3d modeler in my opinion, I’ve had it for 4 days and it’s amazing how fast it renders, the fans can get a little loud but it Keeps it cool so I don’t care at all. The package came in perfect conditions, The 4K screen is just amazing, I read about how annoying the keyboard would be but it’s super comfortable and smooth to type, i haven’t got any problems so far while testing it’s magnificence, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Paula ramirez rivera

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Screen horrible Laptop
customer_reviews.text: First off the screen is absolutely gorgeous but the buck stops there. The laptop simply is not built to handle it's thermals. We're talking temps in excess of 90c on menial tasks such as basic video encoding and even on photo editing. Throttlestop or some form of under volting is an absolute necessity to even use this computer for work. My PC had chronic USB issues with the ports constantly failing to read or write and detect simple accessories such as a mouse. Do yourself a favor and look elsewhere as this same screen can be found in multiple other laptops.
customer_reviews.author: Collin B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality laptop - better than the previous aero 15 versions
customer_reviews.text: Laptop works well. However, when I first started it, it wouldn't get past the gigabyte logo screen and would keep resetting to that screen. I got around it by mashing f12 and choosing windows to start. A little annoying, but not a big deal since it hasn't happened since then. Battery is a little lackluster, but that's kinda to be expected. I played destiny 2 and ace combat 7 - both of which ran very well. Still, it may vary for you depending on which game you play, considering that the laptop is apparently aimed towards designers...
customer_reviews.author: Coma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome laptop!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is everything I was looking for and more!
customer_reviews.author: arbaker08

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: The screen is great. The performance is great once you add another stick of ram if you bought the 8gb version. There are some scaling issues with the 4k panel but that is Microsoft's fault. Battery could be a little better getting about 5 hours right now.
customer_reviews.author: Abhinav

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I had the m15 OLED. It had a number of issues, chief of which it has no HDR for games & apps bewilderingly. I am pleased Gigabyte was not so shortsighted. I'm tempted to give it a 5 star but I'm strict on handing those out.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 1/2 Month
customer_reviews.text: I owned this product for half a month before it started overheating and the internal speakers died. I returned back to Amazon, luckily they gave a refund no questions asked. But to own a computer for half a month and have it already have issues while you're taking care of it is absurd. (I didnt even move it around, it stayed at one desk) Definitely wouldnt recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ZacharyGreatonProductions

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen
customer_reviews.text: The screen is awesome. You could get the same specs for a lower price on another model, but the colors and the contrast of the OLED are unbeatable. The software utility for controlling the RGB keyboard could be better. It kept freezing and I had to download the setup from the website to reinstall. Still feels slow and buggy, but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: gilberto.marcon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Such a good laptop all around. Keyboard is great, build quality is magnificent and the performance is stellar. The only gripe i have is Amazon sent me the OLED model instead of the 244Hz panel which would have been great for video and photo editing, but i don't do that.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: It has issued
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is great, portable and light, but I had bad time with the fans throttling up randomly even when idle. It’s extremely loud that you can’t do proper work on it, won’t consider buying it at all
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Mahmoud

customer_reviews.title: great overall, missing some
customer_reviews.text: AERO has great cooling, powerful specs that I enjoy. While it has a large battery, I do want the PD charging for extra portability that unfortunately is not present on this device as well as the 2020 models.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Got exactly what I wanted. A device that I can carry around and still game like crazy on. Fantastic. -Fan can be loud sometimes. But obviously that's because its running high spec games.
customer_reviews.author: Phong Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Powerful laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great performance and doesn't get too hot. Battery life is above average for a gaming PC. The 4k OLED screen is stunning but there is noticeable banding on low brightness especially on grey.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Dinh

customer_reviews.title: Watch your nose.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great laptop! Never used the camera, I’m afraid to see what my nose looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Cris Lorenzo Cafaro

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use this laptop for my content creation etc. and absolutely loved it! The screen is beautiful, battery life is superb, and on a very light platform. This laptop exceeded all of my expectations for use. I was able to play games, stream, and edit without any issues. I loved the battery life. Being able to use this on an airplane without having to worry about it draining was amazing! I would highly recommend this laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki I.

customer_reviews.title: GIGABYTE laptop RTX 2080 Review
customer_reviews.text: Love the laptop. -The AMOLED panel is stunning beautiful! It literally looks like those high quality TV display at BestBuy store. -The slide cover design is thoughtful. I used to use tape to cover the webcam, but no need to do that anymore. -Great RGB keyboard, feel very smooth while typing -Fingerprint sensor for windows hello
customer_reviews.author: Amz customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable i9 and good graphics card
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with it, it's good for my gaming and video editing needs.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Tohn

customer_reviews.title: Brightness, drivers
customer_reviews.text: The brightness was very dim and the drivers themselves were not fully functional, had to reinstall. Otherwise, the laptop was good.
customer_reviews.author: J Luo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR VIDEO EDITING
customer_reviews.text: Recently got my order for my video editing work. The OLED panel is just amazing as it provides brighter and clearer images. Also, it doesn't lag even when I tried editing high resolution videos. Overall, it is just amazing with its great performance, and it is easy to carry (looks fashionable to bring it around :) )
customer_reviews.author: Onepunchman
